name: Lost in the tomb
description: An adventurer lost in the crypt of the ancient Egyptian pyramids. He needs to go through many dungeons to get to the surface.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Intel Pentium IV @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 3000 + @ 1.8 GHz Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
